--- select_array_with_struct.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  UNNEST(ARRAY<STRUCT<x INT64, y STRING>>[(1, 'foo'), (3, 'bar')])

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
      &parser.Star{
        pos: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &parser.From{
      pos:    11,
      Source: &parser.Unnest{
        pos:      18,
        end:      82,
        Implicit: false,
        Expr:     &parser.ArrayLiteral{
          pos:  25,
          end:  81,
          Type: &parser.StructType{
            pos:    31,
            end:    56,
            Fields: []*parser.FieldType{
              &parser.FieldType{
                Member: &parser.Ident{
                  pos:  38,
                  end:  39,
                  Name: "x",
                },
                Type: &parser.SimpleType{
                  pos:  40,
                  Name: "INT64",
                },
              },
              &parser.FieldType{
                Member: &parser.Ident{
                  pos:  47,
                  end:  48,
                  Name: "y",
                },
                Type: &parser.SimpleType{
                  pos:  49,
                  Name: "STRING",
                },
              },
            },
          },
          Values: []parser.Expr{
            &parser.StructLiteral{
              pos:    58,
              end:    68,
              Fields: []*parser.FieldType{},
              Values: []parser.Expr{
                &parser.IntLiteral{
                  pos:   59,
                  end:   60,
                  Base:  10,
                  Value: "1",
                },
                &parser.StringLiteral{
                  pos:   62,
                  end:   67,
                  Value: "foo",
                },
              },
            },
            &parser.StructLiteral{
              pos:    70,
              end:    80,
              Fields: []*parser.FieldType{},
              Values: []parser.Expr{
                &parser.IntLiteral{
                  pos:   71,
                  end:   72,
                  Base:  10,
                  Value: "3",
                },
                &parser.StringLiteral{
                  pos:   74,
                  end:   79,
                  Value: "bar",
                },
              },
            },
          },
        },
        Hint:       (*parser.Hint)(nil),
        As:         (*parser.AsAlias)(nil),
        WithOffset: (*parser.WithOffset)(nil),
        Sample:     (*parser.TableSample)(nil),
      },
    },
    Where:   (*parser.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM UNNEST(ARRAY<STRUCT<x INT64, y STRING>>[STRUCT(1, "foo"), STRUCT(3, "bar")])
